name: Farm Splash Happy Famer
description:
Farm Splash Happy Farmer connect cute animals to crush them and make an explosion.
This is the ultimate smasher game with many levels will addict you.
Use different boosters to clear all obstacles.
Add power ups by connecting same animals in a flow.

Link the animals and eliminate cute animals.

Dash through farm and take care animals.

How To Play Farm Splash Happy Farmer:

Make a line of animals and pop them.
Catch the animal that are identical and smash it.

Features:

- High rated graphics
- Different and interesting Obstacles.
- Lots of cute and funny animals.
